resources.string:
Jumio is an AI platform that deliver identity verification as it should be, helping companies fight fraud. Jumio uses the power of informed AI, biometrics, machine learning, and certified liveness detection to help you rapidly convert more customers, stop fraudsters from infiltrating your online ecosystem. 
Jumio also helps organizations meet regulatory compliance including KYC, AML and GDPR and has verified more than 225 million identities issued by over 200 countries and territories from real-time web and mobile transactions. Jumio’s solutions are used by leading companies in the financial services, sharing economy, digital currency, retail, travel and online gaming sectors. 

 This program is intiative under CSR of the company where it aims to reach more than 10,000 tribal women of Udaipur district and to sensitize tribal on menstruation health and hygiene.

Shrushti Seva Samiti was founded in 1999 with a vision to create an equal and just society where the vulnerable and marginalized sections of the society effectively participate in the development process leading to control over their resources”. 
SHRUSHTI is having active presence in 12 districts of Rajasthan with reach over more than 59,000 households through direct interventions. The present people engaged with the organization are more than 650. The organisation is currently trusted partner of institutions like Department of Science and Technology, Government of India, Hindustan Zinc Limited, IIFL Foundation, Women and Child Development Department, GOI, Care India, Jumio India Pvt. Ltd., Sightsavers International, IGSSS and others.


Shrushti works in following thematic areas local governance systems, health and nutrition, education, livelihood and implementation of government welfare scheme. Shrusthi’s office is based in Udaipur with staff present in more than 12 districts. For more information about the organisation, please visit http://www.shrushti.org/
शुभकामनाएं, आपके सभी उत्तर सही हैं। कृपया अगले मॉड्यूल को प्रारम्भ करे।
\u2022 सभी प्रश्नों के उत्तर देना अनिवार्य है।\n\u2022 गलत उत्तर देने पर दोबारा वविकल्प चुनें।\n\u2022 अगर आपको उत्तर नहीं पता तो मॉड्यूल दोबारा देखे।
A community of passionate individuals whose purpose is to revolutionize software design,creation,content and delivery while advocating for positive social change
